content:
About This Directory

This directory contains a copy of the page tetrahedron.html, and the accompanying image tetrarray.gif, created by Robert M. Dickau and previously found at http://www.wri.com/~robertd/. Dickau is leaving Wolfram and gave permission for his page to be saved here.

From the Geometry Junkyard, computational and recreational geometry pointers.
David Eppstein, Theory Group, ICS, UC Irvine.
Last update: .
